location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Plan of the Confidential Office of the Political Agency, Bahrain, and Elevations

mods.abstract: These architectural drawings consist of a plan and elevations of the Confidential Office of the Political Agency, Bahrain. The drawings were prepared by the Public Works Department of Bahrain.The drawings are hand drawn in black, red and blue ink on tracing paper. Labels on the drawings are hand written in black ink and blue and grey pencil.
